title: The Cost of Doing Business
author: verias
text:
Seems the Pawnbroker isn't just a pretty face, and knew precisely what William had when he walked in.

The question now is whether or not William's willing to part with the amulet Chrys gave to him, and if the price he's being asked to give, is worth what he's been looking for.

We'll just have to see, won't we?
